content.rendered:
On Friday, August 9th, we received a group of high school students participating in the Law in Action Within Schools (LAWS) program for a tour of the LIZ! Students learned about our incubation program, initiatives and partnerships, while visiting our space and the DMZ.

Click here to see LIZ’s newsletter.
